name: Sand Wars - Card Game Battle (ruinera)
description:
Thanks to Taha for all contribution he made into the project, he was responsible for development of the Sand Wars. You can check out his Itch.io page.

Build a deck as you battle across the coast, gathering powerful cards along the way. With strategy and a bit of luck, you might be able to smash your opponent's castle to become the conquerer of the island! 

A singleplayer & multiplayer adventure, play with 30+ cards and three unique resources to engineer a custom deck to your own design.

FEATURES 

- Free to play mobile card game.

- Strategic deck building and card-based combat. 

- Three resources to choose from, each with its own strategy 

- Upgrade your produce for new powers and adventures. 

- Dragons, attacks, and lots of other surprises...

- Real-time multiplayer duels! Duel your friends! (2 player mode)

- Learn to adapt to new strategies and defeat your enemies

- Excellent graphics

Ready to start? Play this online card game battle now for free!
